import React from "react"; import * as emailjs from 'emailjs-com'; import imageOverlay from "../img/contact.JPEG"; class Contact extends React.Component { render() { function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_gndgaye', 'template_udhe2wt', '.contactForm', 'user_ztdLXszM1osYvxcU00T3Z', e.target) .then((result) => { window.confirm("Thank you for Contacting me I will get back to you soon") console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); e.target.reset() } return (
